species.name: milotic
descriptions: It is said to live at the bottom of large lakes. Considered to be the most beautiful of all Pokémon, it has been depicted in paintings and statues.
It is the world’s most beautiful Pokémon. There are many works of art featuring Milotic.
It lives at the bottom of clear lakes. In times of war, it shows itself, which soothes people’s minds and hearts.
Its dwelling place is the bottom of big lakes. Those who behold its loveliness are said to have their hearts purified.
Its lovely scales are described as rainbow colored. They change color depending on the viewing angle.

abilities.name: marvel-scale
abilities.effect: Increases Defense to 1.5× with a major status ailment.

abilities.name: competitive
abilities.effect: Raises Special Attack by two stages upon having any stat lowered.

abilities.name: cute-charm
abilities.effect: Has a 30% chance of infatuating attacking Pokémon on contact.
